verses.verse: Now on the<WG1161> first<WG1520> day of the week,<WG4521> Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094> went<WG2064> early,<WG4404> while it was<WG5607> still<WG2089> dark,<WG4653> to<WG1519> the tomb,<WG3419> and<WG2532> saw<WG991> the stone<WG3037> taken away<WG142> from<WG1537> the tomb.<WG3419>

Therefore<WG3767> she ran<WG5143> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> Simon<WG4613> Peter,<WG4074> and<WG2532> to<WG4314> the other<WG243> disciple<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved,<WG5368> and<WG2532> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "They have taken away<WG142> the Lord<WG2962> out of<WG1537> the tomb,<WG3419> and<WG2532> we don't<WG3756> know<WG1492> where<WG4226> they have laid<WG5087> him!<WG846>"
Therefore<WG3767> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> other<WG243> disciple<WG3101> went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> they went<WG2064> toward<WG1519> the tomb.<WG3419>

They<WG1161> both<WG1417> ran<WG5143> together.<WG3674> The<WG2532> other<WG243> disciple<WG3101> outran<WG4390><WG99999> Peter,<WG4074> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> the tomb<WG3419> first.<WG4413>
<WG2532> Stooping<WG3879> and looking in,<WG991> he saw the linen cloths<WG3608> lying,<WG2749> yet<WG3305> he<WG1525> didn't<WG3756> enter in.<WG1525>

Then<WG3767> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> came,<WG2064> following<WG190> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the tomb.<WG3419> He<WG2532> saw<WG2334> the linen cloths<WG3608> lying,<WG2749>

and<WG2532> the cloth<WG4676> that<WG3739> had been<WG2258> on<WG1909> his<WG846> head,<WG2776> not<WG3756> lying<WG2749> with<WG3326> the linen cloths,<WG3608> but<WG235> rolled up<WG1794> in<WG1519> a<WG1520> place<WG5117> by itself.<WG5565>

So<WG2532> then<WG5119> the<WG3767> other<WG243> disciple<WG3101> who<WG3588> came<WG2064> first<WG4413> to<WG1519> the tomb<WG3419> also entered in,<WG1525> and<WG2532> he saw<WG1492> and<WG2532> believed.<WG4100>
For<WG1063> as yet<WG3764> they didn't<WG3764> know<WG1492> the Scripture,<WG1124> that<WG3754> he<WG846> must<WG1163> rise<WG450> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>
So<WG3767> the disciples<WG3101> went away<WG565> again<WG3825> to<WG4314> their own homes.<WG1438>

But<WG1161> Mary<WG3137> was standing<WG2476> outside<WG1854> at<WG4314> the tomb<WG3419> weeping.<WG2799> So,<WG3767> as<WG5613> she wept,<WG2799> she stooped<WG3879> and looked into<WG1519> the tomb,<WG3419>

and<WG2532> she saw<WG2334> two<WG1417> angels<WG32> in<WG1722> white<WG3022> sitting,<WG2516> one<WG1520> at<WG4314> the head,<WG2776> and<WG2532> one<WG1520> at<WG4314> the feet,<WG4228> where<WG3699> the body<WG4983> of Jesus<WG2424> had lain.<WG2749>

<WG2532> They<WG1565> told<WG3004> her,<WG846> "Woman,<WG1135> why<WG5101> are you<WG2799> weeping?<WG3004>" She said to them,<WG846> "Because<WG3754> they have taken away<WG142> my<WG3450> Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> I don't<WG3756> know<WG1492> where<WG4226> they have laid<WG5087> him.<WG846>"

<WG2532> When she had<WG2036> said<WG2036> this,<WG5023> she turned<WG4762> around<WG1519> <WG3694> and<WG2532> saw<WG2334> Jesus<WG2424> standing,<WG2476> and<WG2532> didn't<WG3756> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> Jesus.<WG2424>

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her,<WG846> "Woman,<WG1135> why<WG5101> are you<WG2799> weeping?<WG5101> Who are you<WG2212> looking for?<WG1565>" She, supposing<WG1380> <WG3754> him<WG3588> to be<WG2076> the gardener,<WG2780> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Sir,<WG2962> if<WG1487> you<WG4771> have carried<WG941> him<WG846> away,<WG941> tell<WG2036> me<WG3427> where<WG4226> you have laid<WG5087> him,<WG846> and I<WG2504> will take<WG142> him<WG846> away.<WG142>"
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her,<WG846> "Mary.<WG3137>" She turned<WG1565> and said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Rabboni!<WG4462>" which<WG3739> is to say,<WG3004> "Teacher!<WG1320>"

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her,<WG846> "Don't<WG3361> hold<WG680> me,<WG3450> for<WG1063> I haven't<WG305> yet<WG3768> ascended<WG305> to<WG4314> my<WG3450> Father;<WG3962> but<WG1161> go<WG4198> to<WG4314> my<WG3450> brothers,<WG80> and<WG2532> tell<WG2036> them,<WG846> <WG305> 'I am ascending to<WG4314> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> your<WG5216> Father,<WG3962> to<WG2532> my<WG3450> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> your<WG5216> God.<WG2316>'"

Mary<WG3137> Magdalene<WG3094> came<WG2064> and told<WG518> the disciples<WG3101> that<WG3754> she had seen<WG3708> the Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> that he had said<WG2036> these things<WG5023> to her.<WG846>

When<WG3767> therefore<WG3767> it was evening,<WG3798> on that day,<WG2250> the first<WG1520> day<WG2250> of the week,<WG4521> and when<WG2532> the doors<WG2374> were<WG2258> locked where<WG3699> the disciples<WG3101> were<WG2258> assembled,<WG4863> for<WG1223> fear<WG5401> of the Jews,<WG2453> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> stood<WG2476> in<WG1519> the midst,<WG3319> and<WG2532> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Peace<WG1515> be to you.<WG5213>"

When he had<WG5124> said<WG2036> this,<WG5124> he showed<WG1166> them<WG846> his<WG846> hands<WG5495> and<WG2532> his<WG846> side.<WG4125> The disciples<WG3101> therefore<WG3767> were<WG5463> glad<WG5463> when they saw<WG1492> the Lord.<WG2962>

Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> to them<WG846> again,<WG3825> "Peace<WG1515> be to you.<WG5213> As<WG2531> the Father<WG3962> has sent<WG649> me,<WG3165> even so<WG2504> I<WG3992> send you.<WG5209>"
When<WG2532> he had said<WG2036> this,<WG5124> he breathed on<WG1720> them,<WG2532> and said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Receive<WG2983> the Holy<WG40> Spirit!<WG4151>
If you forgive<WG863><WG99999> anyone<WG5100>'s sins,<WG266> they have been forgiven<WG863> them.<WG846> If you retain<WG2902><WG99999> anyone<WG5100>'s sins,<WG2902> they have been retained."
But<WG1161> Thomas,<WG2381> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> the twelve,<WG1427> called<WG3004> Didymus,<WG1324> wasn't<WG2258> <WG3756> with<WG3326> them<WG846> when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> came.<WG2064>

The other<WG243> disciples<WG3101> therefore<WG3767> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "We have seen<WG3708> the Lord!<WG2962>" But<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Unless<WG1437> <WG3361> I see<WG1492> in<WG1722> his<WG846> hands<WG5495> the print<WG5179> of the nails,<WG2247> and<WG2532> put<WG906> my<WG3450> hand<WG5495> into<WG1519> his<WG846> side,<WG4125> I will<WG4100> not<WG3756> <WG3361> believe.<WG4100>"

<WG2532> After<WG3326> eight<WG3638> days<WG2250> again<WG3825> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> were<WG2258> inside,<WG2080> and<WG2532> Thomas<WG2381> was with<WG3326> them.<WG846> Jesus<WG2424> came,<WG2064> the doors<WG2374> being locked,<WG2808> and<WG2532> stood<WG2476> in<WG1519> the midst,<WG3319> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> "Peace<WG1515> be to you.<WG5213>"

Then<WG1534> he<WG3004> said to Thomas,<WG2381> "Reach<WG5342> here<WG5602> your<WG4675> finger,<WG1147> and<WG2532> see<WG1492> my<WG3450> hands.<WG5495> <WG2532> Reach here<WG5342> your<WG4675> hand,<WG5495> and<WG2532> put<WG906> it into<WG1519> my<WG3450> side.<WG4125> <WG2532> Don't<WG3361> be<WG1096> unbelieving,<WG571> but<WG235> believing.<WG4103>"
<WG2532> Thomas<WG2381> answered<WG611> <WG2532> him,<WG846> "My<WG3450> Lord<WG2962> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> God!<WG2316>"

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> <WG2381> "Because<WG3754> you have seen<WG3708> me,<WG3165> you have believed.<WG4100> Blessed<WG3107> are those who<WG3588> have<WG1492> not<WG3361> seen,<WG1492> and<WG2532> have believed.<WG4100>"

<WG2532> Therefore<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424><WG99999> did<WG4160> many<WG4183> other<WG243> signs<WG4592> in the presence of<WG1799> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> which<WG3739> are<WG2076> not<WG3756> written<WG1125> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> book;<WG975>

but<WG1161> these<WG5023> are written,<WG1125> that<WG2443> you may believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> is<WG2076> the Christ,<WG5547> the Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> that<WG2443> believing<WG4100> you may have<WG2192> life<WG2222> in<WG1722> his<WG846> name.<WG3686>
